name: RandomWeather
author: Taako
description: A cog for generating random daily weather updates with support for the AAA3A Dashboard Cog.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the RandomWeather cog! Use `[p]rweather` for commands. Supports the AAA3A Dashboard Cog for managing settings.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
